title: Amber

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Preserve a dead body in Amber every night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The night you preserve them, you will be able to use their ability on any player (including yourself), and their ability now rampages.
-You cannot preserve someone in Amber more than once in the entire game

desc:

*We've been studying on how to resurrect the Beasts.*
